ui_server.c

Server related UI.

Assembly servers list configuration dialog and server select dialog for flow execution (TODO).

Summary
ui_server.cServer related UI.
PrivatePrivate functions.
Functions
server_common_tooltip_callbackCallback for tree view tooltip
server_common_connectCallback for popup menu action
server_common_disconnectCallback for popup menu action
server_common_autoconnectCallback for popup menu action
server_common_removeCallback for popup menu action
server_common_setupSetup common server dialogs stuff
server_common_actionsTake the appropriate action when the server dialog emmits a response signal.
server_list_addCallback to add a server to the server list
on_add_clickedCall for entry activation
on_add_clickedCall for add button
server_select_cursor_changedEnable OK button if we are logged into server.
PublicPublic functions.
Functions
server_list_setup_uiAssembly the servers configurations dialog.
server_list_showShow ui server list taking appropriate actions
server_list_updated_statusUpdate status of server in store
server_select_setup_uiSelect a server to run a flow.
